about_the_game:
Mixing genres of a card game, roguelike, and deep tactical gameplay with interactive obstacles and objects creates one of the most unique games you’ve ever seen. Build your unique deck, engage in thrilling battles and quests to acquire powerful artifacts, and uncover the mysteries hidden within the Stone of Adventure!

Features:

  • Tactical Card Game: Battles unfold in a dynamic 3D space, where every element of the environment is a tool for victory. Throw rocks, topple trees, and combine cards with world elements to claim victory!

  • Procedural Generation: Each battle map, global map, rewards, and other game elements are freshly generated for every run, making every attempt unique and delivering fresh emotions with every playthrough!

  • Explore Amazing Worlds: Embark on an exciting adventure across four unique worlds! Discover rare cards, valuable artifacts, unexpected allies, and take on quests ranging from simple tasks to challenging trials. Each journey offers new discoveries and unforgettable experiences!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
